DOC.brief_summary: A new immunosuppressive drug , base inhibition important enzyme immune system call JAK3 , develop Pfizer prevent transplant rejection . In study A3921009 , kidney transplant patient give JAK inhibitor tacrolimus 6 month posttransplant . Patients complete study A3921009 offer opportunity participate study A3921021 extend evaluation safety efficacy CP-690,550 versus tacrolimus 8 year posttransplant . In treatment group 1 ( control arm ) , subject continue receive tacrolimus . In treatment group 2 3 , subject continue receive CP-690,550 . Per Amendment 4 , tacrolimus comparator arm discontinue .
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Of Stage 1 Subjects Of Study A3921009 For The Prevention Of Acute Rejection In Kidney Transplant Patient
DOC.criteria: Enrollment Stage 1 Study A3921009 complete 6months treatment trial medication ( CP690,550 tacrolimus ) Recipient firsttime kidney transplant Subject untreated condition may affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy clinically significant diabetic gastroenteropathy ) . Subjects wait list second kidney transplant nonrenal organ transplant .
